nodes.text: Orailus was a male Human who served as a medic for the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic.

During the Cold War, while in the Valley of the Dark Lords on Korriban, Lieutenant Devron came to him to be healed after he and his team were attack by grave robbers in one of the tombs. Orailus warned him that if anything valuable was gone, Devron would regret it.
